entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 5:20 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
